itemInfo.itemDesc:
Water Gathered from a river using an Empty Bottle. It can be modified, or used as an ingredient in Crafting.
- How to Obtain: River Water can be obtained by using an Empty Bottle at a river.

※ Pouring a Bottle of River Water on a Garden will increase the available Water Deposit.

item.name: Distilled Water
item.desc:
Clear water that’s been distilled.
- How to Obtain: Distilled Water can be obtained by Heating a Bottle of River Water.

※ Pouring Distilled Water on a Garden will greatly increase the available Water Deposit.

item.name: Purified Water
item.desc:
Can be obtained by refining the bottle of water.
- How to Obtain : Filter the bottle of water
※ Using this item on the garden will greatly increase the amount of water deposit.
It can cure sunstroke.
※ The cool-down time is 5 seconds.

item.name: Alluvial Gold
item.desc: A rare ingredient filtered from River Water that can be Heated to create Gold.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Thinning a Bottle of River Water.

item.name: Waterway
item.desc: Installing a Waterway in a Garden will reduce the amount of water consumed.\n(Right-click to display the closest Fence Exchange location)

item.name: Organic Fertilizer
item.desc: Boosts growth rate of crops. Using fertilizer reduces the growth time for crops in the garden.\n※ There's a cool-down time of 5 seconds.
